title: (2380) Malhou - CM1442
description: Parking lot of the Praia Fluvial Olhos D'Agua in an olive grove. Shady and flat places available. You have to try something out. At Praia Fluvial, which is about 3 minutes from the parking lot, there are toilets, cold showers, trash cans, a bar / restaurant and tent camping next to the river bath. There are no facilities at the parking lot itself. A road leads past the parking lot and is also used at night. It can be noisy at the weekend, as the Praia is very busy in summer. Unfortunately there is rubbish everywhere.

title: (2380) - CM1442
description: WC, picnic tables, view of the river, beautiful place!

title: () Praia do Ribatejo - N3
description: Free parking and service point, worth a night or two. Lots of flat parking overlooking river & bridge. Pretty village 5 mins walk over the bridge with shops. Beware steep drive direct to bottom level, if you access by entering top level (left) first the next slope is much better.

title: (2250-020) Constância - Avenida das Forças Armadas

title: (2300) Tomar - 50 Rua Doutor José Maria de Sousa
title_short: (2300) Tomar - 50 Rua Doutor José Maria de Sousa

Small car park below the convent
ideal in April, surely more complicated in high season free from 8 p.m. to 8 a.m.

address.street: 50 Rua Doutor José Maria de Sousa

title: (2250) - Unnamed Road
description: Parking to visit downtown Viva Science Astronomie. For Myores and children. We spent one night without a problem. Only there was wind. Superb view.

title: (2300) Tomar - 14 Travessa João Freire Gameiro
description: Park it's allowed overnight, it's forbidden park at Friday because it's local market

title: (2300) Tomar - Rua Aquiles da Mota Lima
title_short: (2300) Tomar - Rua Aquiles da Mota Lima
description: 2016.12.14 - Small parking on cobblestones facing the citadel / monastery on the edge of a quite noisy street and not far from the city center. This place completes the 2 nearby car parks already listed on Park4nigth. Here no maintenance service or wifi access. Nevertheless and close to the Bombeiros the bar Capitulo allows you to access the wifi with the code "superbock" (without parentheses!)

title: (2300) Tomar - 1 Rua Santa Iria
description: Large municipal parking, be careful not parked on Thursdays and Fridays because there is the market, a sign tells you the times, otherwise parking place well for visits and quiet overall, it is better to park on the part at bottom of the car park yes there are the wooden barriers as there is room for cantilever and shade and about 25 seats

title: (2300-153) Tomar - 8 Rua Amorim Rosa
description: Self service laundry, laundromat

name: Quinta das Lameiras
title: (2300) Quinta das Lameiras
description: Hello friends Our humble Biological Farm with an area of ​​3ha. We are 9km from the Templar city of Tomar, 4km from the river beach of Alverangel, 2.5km from the clean water river. Train station 3km away. We can be your Uber. We have a Hostel4campers with enough space for campers, caravans and some tents. Access to private bathroom; Common interior room (40m2 with sofas, swings and area for children to play; free kitchen with large table, free fridge, only washing machine and gas stove are paid ; There is also a outdoor leisure area with swings. Electricity 10amp; Disposal of dirty water and access to drinking water. Fresh homemade bread.. We can have a traditional Portuguese meal. We look forward to welcome you. Don't hesitate to visit our profile on Instagram (quinta_das_lameiras) or FB (Quinta das Lameiras - Sº Pedro de Tomar). We have a small grocery store where you can find products from our farm and other farmers. Depending on the season we have vegetables, fruit, eggs, cottage cheese, olive oil and duck meat, lamb, chicken and turkey, rice, tuna, vinegar, etc. Being happy is the most important thing! Our backyard is the world! Love of João, Sara and Children

title: () Tomar - Rua Horta do Barão
description: Was once a community campsite, is now a free pitch. Laundry is possible on site on washboards. Ideally located for visiting the castle and the city. Public toilets at the sports center. Public toilets 100 m away at the stadium/playground. There are a few cats running around here who also live here, which may be the deciding factor for one or the other dog owner.

title: (2300) Tomar - 67 Rua de Coimbra
description: Very large laundry. 6 washing machines 8.12 and 20kms. 6 dryer. Coin mechanism and product included. On the avenue leading to the lidl. Pasteleria chorasqueira nearby. 20 minutes from the area in the modern district. A few meters higher a second laundry.

title: (2300) Tomar - 6 Rua Choromela
description: Lidl parking lot, open between 8.30-22 o'clock.  Very quiet and undisturbed at night.

title: () Santarém - Unnamed Road
description: Here you can stand 4x4 in the riverbed, close to the water or up next to the path where it can be Dusty but if cars drive past. On the weekend possibly heavily visited by the locals. Our stay mid oct during the week was very pleasantly quiet.

title_short: (2485) Mira de Aire - 371 Rua Chão de Empires

you have a nice view to the mountains.

title: (2480) Alvados -
description: Ample space to park for the night for multiple RVs/vans. Quiet spot with no homes in sight and an amazing lookout over the valley below. The only building nearby is the ticket office for the Alvado caves.

name: Quinta da Choupana
title: (2300-404) Quinta da Choupana
description:
Educational farm of 2.7 hectares, quiet and peaceful place. 4 km from the Templar city of Tomar, 30 km from the Sanctuary of Fátima, 1h30 from Lisbon and 2 hours from Porto. Near the dam of Castelo de Bode, Penedo Furado em Villa de Rei, dam of the Caril ...
Price for 2 adults and 2 children up to 13 years old. €5 extra per person.
Use of the swimming pool: €2/day/person.
THANKS

name: Camping Lake Portugal
title: (2300) Camping Lake Portugal
description: Super nice campsite in the countryside by the lake. Quality restaurant with local products. Ideal for discovering Portuguese cuisine. Hospitality and impeccable services (and in French). Very good address!

title: (2300) - Estrada Ribeira
description: Chaotic path, much too steep, very difficult to access and a lot of large mosquitoes on site. We did not stay. I do not recommend at all.

title: (2495) Fátima - Rua da Charneca
description: In a small road on the outskirts of Fatima, it does not seem to be private (no signs) any time there is a property a little further but it seems that it is a secondary access (field). Possible to park on the side in the annex path where between the trees ... We will spend the night and tell you the result as soon as possible :) .. Very good night in peace, I advise for an evening

title: (2495-401) Fátima - 96 Avenida de Dom José Alves Correia da Silva
title_short: (2495-401) Fátima - 96 Avenida de Dom José Alves Correia da Silva

title: (2495) Fátima - Parque do Santuário
description: Nice parking spot. Just behind the sanctuary of Fátima. Very quiet place. No noise. High security.

title: (2495) Fátima - 25 Rua João Paulo II
description: Large free parking with some trees. I do not think that spending the night is disturbing. Provide holds.

title: (2300) Tomar -
description: Beautiful little beach on Lake Carril, a stone's throw from Tomar! If you are looking for a place in nature for the night in order to visit Tomar the next day as I was, this is a great solution! Only downsides: the motorway which is really not far but little frequented at night, and the access which is a little steep on a dirt road should be avoided in rainy weather.

title: (2495-401) Fátima - 50 Rua de São Vicente de Paulo
title_short: (2495-401) Fátima - 50 Rua de São Vicente de Paulo
description: Fatima Parking available for visits. It is true that the number of "camper" places is limited, but apart from "important events and busy days" it is tolerated to park in the "car" parking lot, obviously taking care not to get in the way. In May 2019 the barriers were therefore open and nothing to pay, we stayed one night. Thanks to Fatima for her welcome. SPECIFIC: There are 14 or 15 parking spaces around the site where there is really space, we were in parking lot number 6

address.street: 50 Rua de São Vicente de Paulo

title: (2480) São Bento - Rua Luís de Camões
title_short: (2480) São Bento - Rua Luís de Camões
description: Free parking area above the town with 6 individually laid out bays. Each bay is fully serviced with electricity, water and drainage (electricity and water not working on our visit probably because the aire has only recently opened, November 2019).Lovely area, very quiet.

title: (2480-032) Alvados - 407 Rua Val do Bispo
description: A small place in the village with toilet and shower (cold) and drinking water. Too tight for large CC, only for smaller vehicles

title: (2200) - Unnamed Road
description: Sweet spot. free parking for any sized camper. lake to swim in. perfect

title: (2495) - 15 Rua das Grutas da Moeda
description: Ample free parking in the Grutas da Moeda. There is a snack bar and restrooms. It is not allowed to stay overnight. Services: water, discharge and disposal of toilet.

title: (2495-032) São Mamede - 1 Rua de São Martinho
title_short: (2495-032) São Mamede - 1 Rua de São Martinho
description: Quiet, peaceful Aire with full services. Overnight is welcome. Many thanks to the small community. The coffee, breakfast and freshly baked hot breads at "Padrio Heleno" were wonderful. The only place to eat in this small village is "Marmita Do Ze Grande-Fatima" which is an "eat all you want buffet"  (good selection of home-cooked foods at an amazing price). Excellent.

title: (2495-407) Fátima - 142 Estrada de Leiria

title_short: (2495-032) São Mamede - 2 Rua José dos Santos
description: Maria Sabão - Lavandaria Self-Service Neat neat self-service laundry. 3 washing machines of which 2x 11kg and 1x 18kg and 2 large dryers.

title: (2480) Alvados -
description: Picnic park located next to the municipal road to Alvados. Equipped with WC and BBQ area. Everything very clean and taken care of. The bathrooms have electricity with a socket. There is also a small lagoon that is very low, perhaps due to the time of year. Close to hiking trails.

title: (2025) Tremês - 17 Rua de Santiago
description: Free Water and air for the tires available, next to a bakery, cafe, gas station and car wash

title: (2090) Alpiarça - Unnamed Road
description: Parking lot with stalls, very rudimentary toilets, small bar, drainage grid and drinking water from the tap. Next to a river with herons and surrounded by nature, very quiet for the night and close to the village with all services.

title: (2480) Alcaria - 118 Rua Manuel João Luís Salgueiro Alcaria

the parking areas near the bath are very crowded in the season.

title: (2005) Santarém - 2 Rua Professor Américo Marinho
description: Large, paved parking lot at Parque Aquatico Santatrem. Indoor pool open 10am - 7pm. Large outdoor area only from June to September. Stayed 2-3 days, no service except dumpsters. Very quiet at night, otherwise swimming. Parking space for AC planned.

title: (2440-208) - Rua do Malhadouro
description: Small quiet spot, clearing along the path (very infrequent) place for 2/3 cc or more or less flat vans 50m from the climbing walls. No service

title: (2200-491) Abrantes - R. de São Jerónimo
description: Parking lot on the edge of the city park São Lourenço in Abrantes, which offers children's playgrounds, barbecue and snack areas. A beautiful duck lake invites you to relax. Hiking trails and mountain bike trails in the immediate vicinity.

title: (2440-208) Reguengo do Fetal - 15 Estrada de Fátima
title_short: (2440-208) Reguengo do Fetal - 15 Estrada de Fátima
description: Super point of view at the exit of Fatima, behind a restaurant but not private, easy to maneuver (kind of roundabout) surely cool for a meal and a night

title: (2005) Santarém - 103 N3
description: Gravel Park Place, open day and night for everybody, during the day traffic near the N3, during the night quiet, not so busy like in Santarem, looking safe over night. Lot of space, no services. Some little stores, gas station and restaurants near the place, big grocery stores like Pingo Doce not so far, also Decatlon big store 2 km nearby.

title: (2435-116) Caxarias - 3 Avenida Nossa Senhora de Fátima
title_short: (2435-116) Caxarias - 3 Avenida Nossa Senhora de Fátima
description: Tap for full water. Provide the big end to connect.

title: (2440) Reguengo do Fetal - R. do Malhadouro
title_short: (2440) Reguengo do Fetal - R. do Malhadouro
description: Similar to the spot just up the road but with full mobile coverage (3 bars of 4g). Space for 2 vans. 10 minute walk from the climbing. Nice views. Quiet, peaceful.

title: (2140) - 2 N243
description:
At the entrance to the village of Chouto Nationale 243, new motorhome area, gray and black water drainage, water tap, 12 electricity outlets (currently disabled).
200 meters from the center where there is pharmacy, restaurants, small supermarket.
Quiet, easy access to any size motorhome.
On-site garbage can is very small but just outside the gate is a bigger blue bin that is also a garbage can (see last photo).

title: (2200) Abrantes - Parque de Abrantes
description: Picnic and bbq areas across the road in a lovely park.

title: () Almeirim - Unnamed Road
description: Natural area at the edge of Rio Tejo. Trees limit access to smaller sizes (height width).

title: (2440-208) Reguengo do Fetal - 6a Travessa Nossa Senhora do Fetal
title_short: (2440-208) Reguengo do Fetal - 6a Travessa Nossa Senhora do Fetal
description: If the other sites, on the way to the climb, are taken, there is the cemetery car park, quiet, fairly flat. Please leave the site clean for locals and hedgehogs.

title: (2480) Porto de Mós - 226 N243
description: Location at the edge of the road ideal for two camper because if no cars on top beautiful view, however noisy in the morning with cars that roll at high speed but repairs very well for one night.

title: (2480) Porto de Mós - Unnamed Road
description: Moinho da Cabeça da Vaca it's a magical place with a chilling sunset. It has picnic tables and it is a typical mill in the region where flour was once milled to make bread.

title: (2080) Almeirim - Unnamed Road
description: Good place for fishing or discovering the places or simply for a quiet night's sleep no service.

title: (2200-187) Abrantes - 221 Rua Cidade de Parthenay
description: Self Service Laundry

title: (2480) Alqueidão da Serra - 297 Rua Porto de Mós
title_short: (2480) Alqueidão da Serra - 297 Rua Porto de Mós
description: Very nice water point with tap on the side of the road. good flow

title: (2480) Porto de Mós - 210 Estrada Principal
description: Rest area, located on a mixed parking lot, with greenery, several picnic tables and even a barbecue. 2 km from Porto de Mòs. Facing a small country road, quite quiet. Possibility to spend the day or even the night there. No service. At the start of a beautiful hike (10 km).

title: (2200-241) Abrantes - 3 Rua do Girassol
description: Free parking near the city center except market day.

title: (2495) Leiria - Unnamed Road
description: This is an amazing little picnic parc called “Parque de Merendas da "Fonte de Peixe" - Vale Maior”. We spent 2 nights in the middle of nature, yet with 2 water fountains (one with a thread for hose). A local guy came by and even opened the toilets for us, we are not sure if they are normally open. very quiet nights alone, just nature sounds. there are rubbish containers and when you drive here, there is an asphaltic road (from direction casal dos ferreiros). we came from a different road, but it was very doable with our van, still we recomment coming from the direction mentioned.

title: () Abrantes -
description: Park dedicated to motorhomes next to Historic Center

name: Campo de Futebol da Bezerra
title: (2480) Campo de Futebol da Bezerra
description: It is a place at the start of the Ecopista walk. There is a playground and a football field. It is outdated on the one hand, but the facilities for motorhomes seem very new. There are toilets but they are closed. There is also a place to bbq, but no idea if that can be used. Water works. Everything for free.

title: (2200-420) Abrantes - 37 Rua do Pisco
description: Shop where gas bottles can be exchanged. Also the Campinggaz bottles. Not an LPG station. It is also difficult to get there with a camper / car. I went by bicycle. Have been looking for a shop to exchange camping gas bottles for a long time. You can do that here!!

title: (2005) Santarém - 9 Rua de São Bento
description: Bom local parking, sossegado, free and perto do centro da cidade.

title: (2200-201) Abrantes - Esplanada 1 de Maio
description: Super large motorhome parking with a bird's eye view of the Tagus, just behind the courtyard, ideal for a quiet night. Free parking without amenities, which is also used by passenger cars. Amusement center next door, lots of shopping and parties every night.

title: (2005) Santarém - 6 Rua Bairro Camarário
description: Quiet zone, near habitation, shopping and fast food

title: (2480) Porto de Mós - LH Rua Francisco Serra Frazão
title_short: (2480) Porto de Mós - LH Rua Francisco Serra Frazão
description: Park next to Santa Casa da Misericórdia. Quieter than ASA, because ASA is next to the road. Parking and overnight stay allowed, except on fair days.

title: (2005) Santarém - 1 Rua António Bastos
description: Small parking next to the viewpoint, ideal for a night near the center.

title: (2200-365) Abrantes - 26 Rua 17 de Agosto de 1808
description: Very central flat parking with an incredible view towards south. very calm. fantastic night 200m away from the main brand new museum of Abrantes, very worthy to visit. obligatory to eat at the Santa Isabel restaurant and buy the wonderful sweets at the Palha de Abrantes coffee shop.

title: (2005) Santarém - 49 Rua da Cabine
description: Laundry and gas station

title: (2230) Souto -
description: Schöner Platz am See mit Badezugang. 2 Marmor Picknicktische. Gerader Stellplatz. Sehr steile Zufahrt bergab, für mutige Fahrer. Nicht für Wohnmobile.  NICHT größer als VW Bus. Achtet auf das Wetter. Regen—> rutschig

title: (2480) Porto de Mós - Av. Dr. Licinio Moreira da Silva 2480
title_short: (2480) Porto de Mós - Av. Dr. Licinio Moreira da Silva 2480
description: Large pitches with water and possibility of draining gray and black water. Leisure park with picnic tables, miniature golf, ice rink and beautiful and spacious children's play areas. Next to a busy road during the day. There is clean spring water across the street. The facilities here are very good. With abuse, no electricity.

address.street: Av. Dr. Licinio Moreira da Silva 2480

title: (2480) Porto de Mós - 3 Largo do Rossio
title_short: (2480) Porto de Mós - 3 Largo do Rossio
description:
Free public toilets and showers including changing table. Very clean. Open from 9 a.m. to 7 p.m. Bad parking. It is best to use the parking lot on the opposite side of the park.
Not open on WEEKENDS!

title: (2005-258) Santarém - 61 Rua António Bastos
description: Parking in dirt behind the church. Very big and quiet at the end of the afternoon.

title: (2005) Santarém - Rua Brigadeiro Lino Dias Valente
title_short: (2005) Santarém - Rua Brigadeiro Lino Dias Valente
description:
Grátis e sem Serviços. Dentro do parque da Cidade. Local calmo, tranquilo, seguro e com diversos serviços ao redor. Lojas diversas, bancos, snack-bar, parque infantil. A 15 minutos a pé do centro da Cidade.

Free and without Services. Inside the City Park. Quiet, quiet, safe and with various services around. Various shops, banks, snack bar, children's playground. 15 minutes walk from the city center.

title: (2205) Rossio ao Sul do Tejo - 16 Rua do Carvalho
title_short: (2205) Rossio ao Sul do Tejo - 16 Rua do Carvalho
description: Along the Tejo with tables and barbecue.

name: ParqueTejo - Turismo, Ciência e Lazer (Parque de Campismo e Caravanismo)
title: (2205) ParqueTejo - Turismo, Ciência e Lazer (Parque de Campismo e Caravanismo)
title_short: (2205) ParqueTejo - Turismo, Ciência e Lazer (Parque de Campismo e Caravanismo)
description: Nice camping park with a view over the  Tagus (Tejo) River and Abrantes town hill. Very nice  prices and facilities. All services are free (lot of combined electricity/fresh water plots). Restaurants and grocery stores within walking distance.

title: (2205) Rossio ao Sul do Tejo - 5 Travessa do Cavaco
title_short: (2205) Rossio ao Sul do Tejo - 5 Travessa do Cavaco
description: Public toilets in front of the river.

title: (2200-024) Alferrarede - 1B Rua Vasco da Gama
description: Intermarche services. free black and grey drains. tokens from the petrol station for electric hook u and drinking water. intermarche, bricomarche and car wash and garage next door. Clean services easy access. close to historic monument.

title: (2480-303) Porto de Mós - Rua do Rio Alcaide
title_short: (2480-303) Porto de Mós - Rua do Rio Alcaide
description: Washing machines at the Intermarche parking lot

title: () Abrantes - Esplanada das Docas
description: Parking at the Rio Tejo directly at a busy restaurant and pub, which is open on weekends until 3 am.  There are several waste containers nearby.  Directly opposite on the other side of the river is an event venue where events such as fairs and concerts are held.  There is also the possibility to fill up with water, as well as to dispose of grey water and the toilet.

title: (2200-024) Alferrarede - 12 Rua Doutor David Serras Pereira
title_short: (2200-024) Alferrarede - 12 Rua Doutor David Serras Pereira
description: Church square in Alferrarede. Free parking to share with locals. The bells do not ring after 20h.

title: (2435) Rio de Couros - 117 Rua Principal
description: Picnic area with 3 + 6 tables with seats, some with shadows. Also grill space aside right side tables.

title: (2205-033) Abrantes - Rossio ao Sul do Tejo - Av. Marginal do Tejo
title_short: (2205-033) Abrantes - Rossio ao Sul do Tejo - Av. Marginal do Tejo
description: Parking - Overnight up to 24 hours

address.city: Abrantes - Rossio ao Sul do Tejo

title: (2200) Abrantes - 708 Avenida da Portagem
description:
With a great view to the Ríver Tejo. no facilities. 
This is an authorised location. Overnight stay Up to 48 hrs

title: (2005) Santarém - 15-17 Largo Comendador Paulino da Cunha e Silva
title_short: (2005) Santarém - 15-17 Largo Comendador Paulino da Cunha e Silva
description: Parking close to the historic city center and 300m from the tourist office. convenient to visit the city on foot.

address.street: 15-17 Largo Comendador Paulino da Cunha e Silva

title: (2480) - 13 Rua da Lagoa Grande
description: To spend a quiet night in the natural park, by a lake. There are very clean public toilets, tables, a barbecue, water.

title: (2000) Santarém - 18 Travessa dos Capuchos
description: Only parking but it is possible to spend the night. Near the Church of the Eucharistic Miracle and the Church where the tomb of Pedro Álvares Cabral is found.

title: (2080) Almeirim - Avenida D Joáo I
description: Many parking spaces on the edge of a park, next to a swimming pool. No official motorhome, but enough space to park your motorhome for one night (right in the parking spaces). No facilities but close to shops and restaurants.

title: (2300) - Estrada dos Montes
description: Parking of the fluvial beach. Very calm.

title: (2005) Santarém - 140 Avenida dos Combatentes
description: School parking lot. Available seats. Quiet place.

title: (2000-179) Santarem - 61 Avenida Dom Afonso Henriques
description: Santarem - large covered parking near the bullring. No service, he was advised by the police

title: (2480) Porto de Mós - 26 Rua Serra dos Candeiros
title_short: (2480) Porto de Mós - 26 Rua Serra dos Candeiros
description: Acesso através de terra Batida mas transitável, ótima vista e muito sossegado, tem 6 mesas pic nic e 2 barbecues.Sem água nem Wc.

title: (2000-184) Santarém - 6 Avenida Grupo de Forcados Amadores de Santarém
title_short: (2000-184) Santarém - 6 Avenida Grupo de Forcados Amadores de Santarém
description: Laundry selfservice station. 5 times dryer and 5 times washingmachine.

address.street: 6 Avenida Grupo de Forcados Amadores de Santarém

title: (2040-153) Fráguas - R. Principal
description: Small picnic area with barbecue available and fountain with several drinking water taps. WC but which was locked today

title: () - Unnamed Road
description: This is a nice place to have a lunch. And see the Ribatejo

title: (2080) Almeirim - Rua Professor Dr. António Manuel Baptista
title_short: (2080) Almeirim - Rua Professor Dr. António Manuel Baptista
description:
Parking very quiet and in quiet area. Very used by Caravans and motohomes without any restriction.
Zone of good restaurants and events.
Can stay overnight - Better in a group.

address.street: Rua Professor Dr. António Manuel Baptista

title: (2080) Almeirim - 2080 Rua Professor Dr. António Manuel Baptista
title_short: (2080) Almeirim - 2080 Rua Professor Dr. António Manuel Baptista
description: New Motorhome Area

address.street: 2080 Rua Professor Dr. António Manuel Baptista

title: (2080) Almeirim - Rua de Coruche
description: Gas station have log. 0. 679eur/l

title: (2240) Ferreira do Zêzere - Avenida 13 de Junho
title_short: (2240) Ferreira do Zêzere - Avenida 13 de Junho
description: Intermarché car park where parking is permitted. This place is particularly practical for logistics (Food/fuel, Camping-Gas) but also for laundry since a self-service washing machine is available. The road adjoining the car park is quite busy but the nuisance is bearable. Optimal satellite and 4G reception.

title: (2440) Batalha - 32 Estrada do Casal Novo
description: Temporary parking area on a serviced open lane for future construction and sale of land. Slightly sloping terrain with hard parking spaces away from the city and close to some villas. the land overlooks the city at the top of the hill near a relay antenna. no service but enough for a good night's visit to the monastery the next day. no vehicle at night, only passage of a neighbor who was walking his dog. the lampposts that equip the area do not work unlike those of the nearby road.

title: (2200) Abrantes - E806
description: Service station with picnic area, dump station and water. Cartridges or pipe systems,  not a drive on  dumping grate

title: (2460) - IC2
description: Park for trucks, 24 hours dinner and serviço, with showers. in the gás station

title: (2040) Malaqueijo - 17 Rua dos Combatentes do Ultramar
title_short: (2040) Malaqueijo - 17 Rua dos Combatentes do Ultramar
description: Picnic area in the village next to a cafe and a playground for small children. Place is under trees.

title: (2240) Ferreira do Zêzere - 50 Rua Brigadeiro Lino Valente
title_short: (2240) Ferreira do Zêzere - 50 Rua Brigadeiro Lino Valente
description: Small Park for motorhomes.

name: Casa Féteira
title: (2480-113) Casa Féteira
description:
Welcome you to our olive oil farm!

You can park your camping-car/van in our olive groove everyday of the week.

You can also ask for a guided tour of our olive mill in Portuguese, English or French, and understand how we make one of the bests olive oils of this region. From Mondays to Saturdays, between 9am and 6pm. 

You may want to order our homemade Portuguese meal and/or breakfast . 

You'll find our olive oil and other olive oil products on our shop and you'll be able to take home a piece of our portuguese culture!

We will be very happy to have you!

title: () - Rua do Barreiro
description: Nature, panorama and tranquility! Corner to explore! Other places surely as nice as this one, chosen at random when leaving the summit route. Worth a visit for the villages with countless small stone walls characteristic of the place. In the heights of the natural park with magnificent views of the plains and surely on the Nazaré Sea (for us covered by a cloud bank in the distance). The site is at the entrance to one of the park's hikes, and has a pretty stone vestige and two uninhabited houses (one of which is open to the winds) in the middle of the pines. Not a cat in the middle of August, seems very little frequented (the foot!). Windy, very pleasant in hot weather, a little less on an evening of bad weather.

title: (2200) Abrantes - Estrada do Gaio
description: Station service in abrantes, has free water, black water disposal and WC cleaning. Little supermarket inside and coffe shop. Outside has picnic tables.

title: (2435) Freixianda - 48 EN356
description: Extended picnic and rest area, with about 12 tables+seats and without shadows and 10 grills, toilets including handicap, two lakes with dukes. Large playground. Possible to overnight

title: (2480) Dinez - 47-51 Rua do Barreiro
description: I went there on the recommendation of another GPL gas station because I hadn't taken a tank adapter for my LPG tank bottle with me and I needed the right adapter for Portugal and Spain. All adapters were available there and even normal German gas bottles could be helped. In addition, the LPG price was also very cheap. So it was worth filling up there right away. Easy to reach from the IC-2, only the entrance to the gas station was a bit narrow. Turning with my 7.40 long camper was possible.

title: (2005) - N365
description: Water source to top up. don't know if it's drinkable

title: (2440) Batalha - 2 Rua do Moinho da Vila
title_short: (2440) Batalha - 2 Rua do Moinho da Vila
description: Shaded parking two steps from the sites classified very well for a stopover visits or for a nap at the end of afternoon

title: (2230) Sardoal - N2
description: Quiet location by night, 300m away from EN2 road crossing and 150m from petrol station, with parking places not very flat to sleep. There are picnic tables, trash cans, water and a playground. About 500m away from lower area (several old fountains) of historic center of Sardoal village.

title: (2040-015) Alcobertas - Rua do Olho de Água
title_short: (2040-015) Alcobertas - Rua do Olho de Água
description: Nice picnic area with grills and sinks for washing dishes. In the building next door you'll find the toilets (didn't check if they were open. It's possible to stop even long campers, but parking is slanted.

title: (2440) Batalha - 330 Avenida dos Descobrimentos
description: Nice straight parking lot in a very nice city park not far from the monastery. but with WiFi, basketball, toilets and free mini golf, if you have your putter with you.

title: (2440-038) Batalha - 14 Rua António Cândido da Encarnação
title_short: (2440-038) Batalha - 14 Rua António Cândido da Encarnação
description: Laundry. Self service 8h - 22h everyday.

title: (2440) Batalha - 10 Rua do Infante Dom Fernando
title_short: (2440) Batalha - 10 Rua do Infante Dom Fernando
description: Free parking ideal for the day to visit the monastery which is a 5 minute walk but no places in the shade. Children's playground nearby. Not tested at night.

title: (2230) Sardoal -
description: Motorhome and full service area, on SARDOAL small town (even on iconic EN2 road), which historic center and shops are accessible by walking. The key must be picked at the fire department.

title: (2440) Batalha - 19 Praceta Infante Dom Pedro
description: Laundromat

title: (2230) Sardoal - Travessa Do Freião
description: Place to park maximum 4 motorhomes. 400m till local products shop (“Cá da Terra”) and cultural center. 750m till historic center (buildings and streets from XVI century; pillory) and tourist office.

title: (2440) Batalha - Rue de Dom Douarte
description: This is the official 24-hour free RV park, approximately 200m from the Cathedral. Right next to the good pizzeria Old Jack. Closed on Mondays from 7 a.m. to 2 p.m. due to the market. VE 100m across the street.

title: (2440) Batalha - 2440 Rua do Parque Cónego Manuel Simões Inácio
title_short: (2440) Batalha - 2440 Rua do Parque Cónego Manuel Simões Inácio
description: Let's pass a quiet night. We were two non-local parked motorhomes. A GNR passou, I fell with two motorhomes in no trouble. Passaram some times to go round, allowing pernoita. You have free Wi-Fi access.

address.street: 2440 Rua do Parque Cónego Manuel Simões Inácio

title: (2440) Batalha - Rua Nossa Senhora do Caminho
title_short: (2440) Batalha - Rua Nossa Senhora do Caminho
description: This site is the waste and water service area only, not overnight parking. There’s a charge for fresh water. The overnight parking area with electricity is close by, 100 metres away. 200 metres from the monastery, restaurants and cafes.

title: (2440) Batalha - 2 Rua das Piscinas
description: Electricity, 4 outlets available. For water, go to the other service area 200m further.
